page.title: 19EAST PRESTON SUMMER 1985
page.content: The Festival in East Preston cont. attractions to involve the whole comm- unity. The week began with the Guide Fair. Other events included A Teddy Bears Picnic, An Art Exhibition, Old Photographs of the Village which our class visited, An Art and Craft Fair and Bingo Evening. The stoolball and cricket club ,taking Cowboys and Indians as their theme had a fancy dress stoolball match whilst the Mum's Fun Football against Angmering was great fun. { }The{Carnival Procession,}led by the British Legion Band in which 13 brightly, decorated floats paraded, through the village to the East Preston's school's fete, brought the Festivial to an end. At the school children,parents and friends enjoyed the fancy_dress parade,and a Judo exhibition and a
